content:
That's great to hear! I'm thrilled that you're excited to start reading "The Alice Network". Kate Quinn's writing is captivating, and I'm sure you'll become invested in the lives of Charlie and Eve.

And yes, I'm familiar with the Book Riot podcast! It's an excellent resource for book lovers, and the hosts are indeed knowledgeable and enthusiastic about books. They offer a wide range of topics, from author interviews to book recommendations, and even explore various genres and themes. It's a great way to stay up-to-date on new releases, discover new authors, and connect with fellow book enthusiasts.

If you're enjoying the podcast, you might also want to check out Book Riot's website, which features articles, lists, and reviews on various book-related topics. They also have a newsletter and social media channels where they share even more bookish content.

It's fantastic that you've found a podcast that resonates with you, and I'm sure you'll continue to discover new books and authors to add to your reading list. Happy listening and reading!
